newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Trading all quiet after hours.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Trading all quiet after hours.

text.p: Traders said there was little activity after hours on Thursday.

After the markets closed, Hollywood Casino Corp posted a third-quarter net loss of $0.34 per share compared to a net profit of $0.29 per share and Samsonite Corp said it would take a third-quarter restructuring charge of $10.7 million.
The New York Stock Exchange said its session one volume was 36,200 shares compared to no volume on Wednesday.
Session two volume was 5,644,200 shares compared to 926,900 shares on Wednesday.
The American Stock Exchange said there was no after-hours activity.
